korean: 사소한 일로 친구랑 싸워서 기분이 안 좋다.
서로 오해가 있었던 것 같은데 풀기가 쉽지 않아.
나는 늦을 거라고 미리 말했다고 생각했는데 친구는 못 들었대.
친구는 한 시간이나 기다렸다고 화가 났어.
나도 억울한 마음이 들어서 말다툼이 됐어.
지금 생각해보니까 내가 잘못한 것 같기도 해.
먼저 연락하는 게 좋을지 시간을 둘지 고민된다.
시간이 지나면 더 어색해질 것 같기도 하고.
빨리 화해하고 싶은데 어떻게 해야 할지 모르겠다.
이런 일로 우정이 틀어지면 안 되는데.
english: I feel bad because I fought with a friend over something trivial.
The problem was that I was late for our appointment.
It seems there was a misunderstanding between us, but honestly, it's not easy to resolve.
I thought I said in advance that I'd be late, but my friend said they didn't hear it.
My friend was upset because they waited for an hour.
I also felt wronged, so it turned into an argument.
Thinking about it now, I think I was in the wrong.
I'm wondering whether to contact them first or give it some time.
If time passes, it might become more awkward.
I want to make up quickly, but I don't know what to do.
I'm thinking about sending an apology message.
I hope my friend will understand my side too.
Our friendship shouldn't fall apart over something like this.
I should gather courage and contact them first tomorrow.
